root.name: Conqueror: A.D. 1086
root.description: OverviewConqueror: A.D. 1086 is a game set in Medieval England that encompasses several genres and gameplay elements. The player starts out as a young knight in control of a small fiefdom and is charged with the task of developing their territory, building a castle, and creating an army. In addition to this, you have the ability to travel around the country attending tournaments which effect your popularity and allow you to court nobel women.The game has two distinct win conditions. You can chose to attack London and overthrow the king, or alternatively you can hunt down and kill a dragon in Wales.
